examples: The truck carried a load of construction materials to the building site.
They're going to build on the site of the old power station.
The constant noise from the construction site vexed the residents of the neighborhood.
The steel-toe boots are mandatory for workers in construction sites to ensure safety.
Developers want to build on the site of the old gasworks.
words.defineEn: an area of land on which something is, was, or will be constructed
words.defineVi: một khu vực đất trên đó một cái gì đó đang, hoặc sẽ được xây dựng

examples: Many schools don’t take full advantage of the Internet.
To take advantage of this extra bonus offer, simply check the box on your order form.
The entrepreneur knew that time and tide wait for no man, so she took advantage of every opportunity to grow her business.
She has a weakness for polite men, use that to your advantage.
The coach had to leave practice early, and the players took advantage of the situation by goofing off and not taking the drills seriously.
words.defineEn: a condition that causes a person or thing to be more successful compared to others
words.defineVi: một điều kiện khiến một người hoặc một vật thành công hơn so với những người khác

examples: The bank raised interest rates.
Many banks have cut commercial builders off cold turkey.
The bank crash has had a ripple effect on the whole community.
Their bank account was in the red again.
You'll pass a bank on the way to the train station.
words.defineEn: a financial institution that keeps and lends money and provides other financial services
words.defineVi: một tổ chức tài chính giữ và cho vay tiền và cung cấp các dịch vụ tài chính khác

examples: The hole calls the thief.
The holes in the cloth were made by moths.
The gardener dug a hole and gently placed the bulb of an onion into the soil.
His ace in the hole is his political influence.
Our superior technology is our ace in the hole.
words.defineEn: an empty space in the body or surface of something solid
words.defineVi: một khoảng trống trong cơ thể hoặc bề mặt của một cái gì đó rắn

examples: She knows her part in the play back to front.
My mom planted beautiful flowers in the front yard.
Carolyn served them iced tea on the front porch.
Creating new music isn't exactly on his front burner anymore.
She had a gap between her front teeth that added character to her smile.
words.defineEn: the part or surface of an object that is faced forward, seen first, or used first
words.defineVi: phần hoặc bề mặt của một vật thể hướng về phía trước, được nhìn thấy trước hoặc được sử dụng trước

examples: The cake was burnt to a cinder.
The old lady's cake wasn't wonderful
My grandmother's hazelnut cake was a crowd-pleaser at the family reunion.
Oh, that takes the cake!
I baked a chocolate cake for my friend's birthday.
words.defineEn: a sweet food that is made by mixing flour, butter or oil, sugar, eggs and other ingredients and then backing it in an oven
words.defineVi: một món ăn ngọt được làm bằng cách trộn bột mì, bơ hoặc dầu, đường, trứng và các thành phần khác rồi cho vào lò nướng

examples: Police are holding two men in connection with last Thursday's bank raid.
He is wanted by the police in connection with an arms theft.
In this connection, I should once again like to haul my own country over the coals.
Although they have their differences, there's no denying that they share a lot of similarities - like mother, like daughter, they have a strong bond and connection.
Hanging your hat on your connection with the professor is not gonna save you this time Jess.
words.defineEn: a relation by which things or people are associated or linked
words.defineVi: một mối quan hệ mà mọi thứ hoặc mọi người được liên kết hoặc liên kết

examples: The economy is struggling.
The economy is going to the dogs.
The economy is falling to pieces.
The consumer has been driving the economy for a number of years.
The country's economy is slowly grinding to a halt.
words.defineEn: the system in which money, goods, and services are produced or distributed in a country or region
words.defineVi: hệ thống trong đó tiền, hàng hóa và dịch vụ được sản xuất hoặc phân phối ở một quốc gia hoặc khu vực

examples: The ham had a smoky flavor.

Cheshire cheese has a unique flavor profile.
The children sipped on fruity herbal tea with flavors of berries and citrus.
Feta cheese adds a tangy flavor to salads.
words.defineEn: the specific taste that a type of food or drink has
words.defineVi: hương vị cụ thể mà một loại thực phẩm hoặc đồ uống có

examples: The team's performance is standing on shaky ground after a series of losses.
Their performance was nothing to write home about.
The performance improved as their confidence grew.
The director praised the actor for their outstanding performance in the movie.
During their performance, they turned heads with their exceptional talent and stage presence.
words.defineEn: the act of presenting something such as a play, piece of music, etc. for entertainment
words.defineVi: hành động trình bày một cái gì đó chẳng hạn như một vở kịch, một bản nhạc, v.v. để giải trí

examples: That DJ's voice really sets my teeth on edge.
He sank his teeth into an apple.
He gritted his teeth in anger.
Their teeth are sharp enough to break the skin.
Their teeth are sharp enough to break the skin.
words.defineEn: one of the things in our mouth that are hard and white and we use to chew and bite food with
words.defineVi: một trong những thứ cứng và trắng trong miệng của chúng ta và chúng ta dùng để nhai và cắn thức ăn bằng

examples: Teaching methods will take various forms.
This business method takes the risk of failure out of the table.
The teaching method has stood the test of time.
To hold with new methods.
This method of testing is the best bet for getting an uncontaminated result.
words.defineEn: a specific way or process of doing something, particularly an established or systematic one
words.defineVi: một cách cụ thể hoặc quá trình làm một cái gì đó, đặc biệt là một thiết lập hoặc có hệ thống

examples: She went halves on gas.
The gas stove has four burners for cooking multiple dishes at once.
She's definitely cooking with gas!
Shouldn't we stop for gas?
They'll definitely be cooking with gas!
words.defineEn: the state of a substance that is neither solid nor liquid
words.defineVi: trạng thái của một chất không rắn cũng không lỏng

examples: The senator held the floor for several hours.
At precisely 6:45 a.m. the rowdiness ceases as Sailor, a union safety expert, takes the floor for his weekly lecture.
She covered the floor with a colorful carpet.
They wiped the floor with us in a 3–0 win.
Share prices have gone through the floor.
words.defineEn: the bottom of a room that we walk on
words.defineVi: dưới cùng của một căn phòng mà chúng tôi đi bộ trên

examples: Parents often support their children financially during college.
The college runs summer courses for foreign students.
The college also runs evening classes in bricklaying and joinery.
College tuitions cost an arm and leg nowadays.
The young man was a twenty-one-year-old college student.
words.defineEn: a university in which students can study up to a bachelor's degree after graduation from school
words.defineVi: một trường đại học trong đó sinh viên có thể học lên đến bằng cử nhân sau khi tốt nghiệp ra trường

examples: Millions of people followed the trial on TV.
The trial was swiftly brought to an end.
In a criminal trial the standard of proof is beyond the reasonable doubt.
The trial has run its course, and the verdict will be announced tomorrow.
The company sent out a trial balloon by leaking a rumor about a new product to test customer interest before investing in its development.
words.defineEn: a legal process examining the evidence of a case in court by a judge and jury and deciding if the accused is guilty
words.defineVi: một quy trình pháp lý kiểm tra bằng chứng của một vụ án tại tòa án bởi một thẩm phán và bồi thẩm đoàn và quyết định xem bị cáo có tội hay không

examples: Knowledge of cooking comes easy to him.

I have no knowledge of the political dos and don'ts.

Her knowledge of ancient history is of the first water, making her a respected authority in the field.
words.defineEn: understanding of or information about a subject after studying and experiencing it
words.defineVi: sự hiểu biết hoặc thông tin về một chủ đề sau khi nghiên cứu và trải nghiệm nó

examples: A fence was being raised around the property.

I added citron to my detox regimen for its cleansing properties.
The fence runs along the edge of the property line.
The property is going for a song because they need to sell it fast.
words.defineEn: a thing or all the things that a person owns
words.defineVi: một điều hoặc tất cả những điều mà một người sở hữu

examples: The plane holds about 300 passengers.
The plane holds about 300 passengers.
We changed planes in Miami.
Your plane leaves in ten minutes.
To take a cab/plane.
words.defineEn: a winged flying vehicle driven by one or more engines
words.defineVi: một phương tiện bay có cánh được điều khiển bởi một hoặc nhiều động cơ

examples: A reporter obtained documents from the company under false pretenses.

Please collect the documents from the receptionist before leaving the building.
words.defineEn: a computer file, book, piece of paper etc. that is used as evidence or a source of information
words.defineVi: một tệp máy tính, sách, mảnh giấy, v.v. được sử dụng làm bằng chứng hoặc nguồn thông tin

examples: He followed a strict diet.

We existed on a diet of rice.
She includes thin slices of celery in her diet.
They lived frugally off a diet of beans and lentils.
words.defineEn: the types of food or drink that people or animals usually consume
words.defineVi: các loại thực phẩm hoặc đồ uống mà người hoặc động vật thường tiêu thụ

examples: His speeches fanned the flames of racial tension.
She memorized the speech word for word.
I lost the gist of his speech.

The politician's speech was all fluff and no substance, just a dog and pony show to get votes.
words.defineEn: a formal talk about a particular topic given to an audience
words.defineVi: một cuộc nói chuyện chính thức về một chủ đề cụ thể được đưa ra cho khán giả

examples: The knee-jerk reaction to this is to call for proper security in all hospitals.

Was it wiser to take the puppy to the police station or await David's reaction?
words.defineEn: an action, thought, or feeling in response to something that has happened
words.defineVi: một hành động, suy nghĩ, hoặc cảm giác để đáp ứng với một cái gì đó đã xảy ra

examples: Verio provides around-the-clock network monitoring and technical support with all promotional packages.

It's an opportunity to network and connect with everybody who is anybody in the high society.
words.defineEn: a number of interconnected electronic devices such as computers that form a system so that data can be shared
words.defineVi: một số thiết bị điện tử được kết nối với nhau như máy tính tạo thành một hệ thống để dữ liệu có thể được chia sẻ

examples: Sales have lost steam in recent weeks.
Sales are growing fast.
Shares went on sale this morning.

The report showed an increase in sales.

words.defineVi: hành động bán một cái gì đó
